der and then ran the crawl twice .I am attaching the crawl log and crawl re=
port for run 1 and 2 in case you want to have a look. The crawl logs seems =
to be very much the same for both runs. Do you think it looks ok to you as =
the warc size remains same =C2=A0for both crawl?
I have some other jobs as =
well which crawled this website so do I need to delete the state directory =
for those jobs as well ?

Thanks Sandip
